about_the_game:
Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping, no-nonsense fighting experience in Punch Kick Club! Drawing inspiration from the legendary Guilty Gear series and the Smash Bros series, this game combines the best of classic 2D fighting with innovative accessibility features to offer an intense, yet user-friendly combat system.

Key Features:

Streamlined Control Scheme
Dive into epic battles with ease using our 4 Button control scheme. Unleash your inner warrior with an Attack button, Special button, Evade button, and Block button.



Customizable Attacks
Tailor your fighting style with customizable attack shortcuts that you bind to other buttons like "Forward Attack on R1” or "Down Special on L2" Execute intricate moves like Quarter Circle motions with just two buttons Down + R1(Forward Attack), putting the power of combos at your fingertips.

No-nonsense Gameplay
Punch Kick Club removes the frustration of grabs and corner traps, allowing you to focus on perfecting your combat skills and dominating the neutral game.

Diverse Game Modes:

Versus Mode
Challenge friends or foes in local multiplayer battles or sharpen your skills against AI opponents.

Online Multiplayer
Take the fight online and compete against players from around the world. Climb the leaderboards and prove your mettle in thrilling ranked matches.

Unique Game Modes
Immerse yourself in captivating game modes, including Volleyball, Combo Challenge, and other fun game modes.

Spectacular Visuals
Experience the almost hand drawn anime inspired Art Style, with different costumes and colors.



Punch Kick Club offers an accessible yet deep fighting game experience that caters to both newcomers and seasoned fighters. Whether you're looking for heart-pounding local battles with friends, intense online competition, or goofy yet fun game modes, Punch Kick Club has it all.

Join the Punch Kick Club – Where Every Strike Tells a Story!
